review: amazing device, great value for price!
author: Reut Amir

review: It's so easy to use and it allows you to broadcast from your phone to your HDMI + USD television.  We have a separate one for when we travel and use it on the hotel TV to watch NetFlix and other videos.
author: BTPACMAN

review: A great way to project your smartphone/laptop content onto the TV!
author: bvrz02

review: Now if only the MLB.tv service didn't crap out all of the time.....
author: ted

review: gotta figure out how to use it--not easy
author: L. Grannis

review: Love this little gadget. No issues. Easy set up. We stream our netflix all the time. Its great for mirroring whatever you might be doing on your laptop. Waiting for compatibility for more apps in the future. But as it is I still love it.
author: Vane

review: What a great product, can cast to my 60 inch TV from my laptop, Pc, android, etc. Surprisingly easy to set up.
author: shockterdoc
